feed.title: Koel Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: make artist/album screen tabs URLs by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2007
  • feat: show Up Next for full screen by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2009
  • fix: upload user avatar by @phanan in b033fe08da505774b1bbe0958729ab4d156ac514
  • chore: make dropzone full screen by @phanan in db2c73e02923ccf1e77a587ad7f4c4c2f06f6497

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.9.0...v7.10.0

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: use default size indices for artist_name and album_name by @nebulade in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2011

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.10.0...v7.10.1

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: option to include/exclude publicly shared media by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2014

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.10.1...v7.10.2

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: remove "own songs only" option by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2018
  • chore: remove the "hide broken icons" directive by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2022
  • feat: auto detect ffmpeg by @phanan in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2023
  • fix: validate proxy auth using proxy IP instead of client IP #2015 by @Anduin2017 in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2020

New Contributors

  • @Anduin2017 made their first contribution in https://github.com/koel/koel/pull/2020

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.10.2...v7.10.3

entry.title: New release for Koel: v7.10.4
entry.content:
• Adding Ray back as a sponsor. It's a super cool app though and you should consider using it if you're a PHP/JS developer.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/koel/koel/compare/v7.10.3...v7.10.4
